Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38561 affecting package containernetworking-plugins for versions less than 1.6.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-38561 affecting package containernetworking-plugins for versions less than 1.6.1-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package containernetworking-plugins is earlier than 1.6.1-4, affected by CVE-2021-38561
